column5: all the best Terry to you and the Mrs.
Congrats to you both Terry! Way to go!
Congrats to Terry and his bride of 30 years.  WTG my friend.
I hear it is all smooth sailing after 30 years...  Congrats to you both...
congrats on the milestone
Congrats to both you and Mrs.  Mike
Happy anniversary to you and your sweetie, Terry. You wearing the pinstripe shirt today?
thanks guys 30 years and she hasn't killed me while I'm sleeping...who da thunk it
Happy Anniversary!  What did ya buy her?  lol
have a good one and hope ya catch alot of fish today after all I think the 30th is slime.

Hell and Dano and I came close in just two nights !  Congratulations Bud ! A rare feat in this day and age. Leah and I hit 25 while at the lake on August the 4th...where the time flies when your havin fun I don't know!  Wayne
The day ain't over yet  Congratulations Terry, that is wonderful.  And congrats to Wayne and Leah also.  Fishermen make the best lovers - hey a new bumper sticker  Joey
Congrats on 30 years of marriage.All those years of folding your laundry I hope she doesn't have to fold your boat   LOL .  MTP
Best to you, Terry, and to the long sufferin' missus, God Bless her pointy little ears.  Congratulations.
Happy Anniversary Terry!
Happy Anniversary Terry.  All the best to you and your wife.
Terry, After 30 years of your shenanigans. I don't think she would wait till you're asleep.  Congrats to you both.
That's a long time to be with anyone!  LOL.  Congrats!
Congrats Terry, that's quite a feat...  Maureen
Congrats on your 30th Terry [and your BETTER half ] LOL  Dont mean   to steal your thunder, but I [we] just had our 49th. It actually does get better.
49..wow......    thanks all seems she felt the need to take me down to lebarons and buy me a reel with a line counter and a rod to go with it  guess I will keep her
Congrat's Terry, Barbara and I just hit 33 and wouldn't change a thing.....
i know your secret ... go fishing  TB
Terry...congrats on 30 years!!  Wishing you many many more to come as well!!  Cliff and Carole
Congrats Terry and Mrs. Terry! I like to see big numbers!
Congrats on 30 Terry! It a real accomplishment in these times. HH
Hey... I missed this one, I thiunk?? LOL.. anyway  Congrats!!!!
